entry.title: WIND WARNING , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 09:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon except rain along parts of the coast late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 130 along parts of the coast late this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 100 except gusting to 150 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming south 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
